Method Detail

formatDist

public static final String formatDist(double distance)
Formats a distance (in meter) to a string, in meter or kilometer, depending on the size. The number format is localized.

Parameters:
distance - distance in m
Returns:
formatted distance with unit (m or km)

formatSpeed

public static final String formatSpeed(double speed)
Formats a distance (in meter per second (m/s)) to a string, in kilometer per hour (km/h). The number format is localized.

Parameters:
speed - speed in m/s
Returns:
formatted speed with unit (km/h)

normalizeAngle

public static final float normalizeAngle(float angle)
Normalize an angle to be in the range 0°-360°.

Parameters:
angle - Angle in degrees
Returns:
Normalized angle in range 0°-360°
